title: United Tractors and Partners Win Indonesian Sustainable Development Awards 2024
body: PT United Tractors Tbk and its partners received multiple accolades at the Indonesian Sustainable Development Awards 2024 for their impactful corporate social responsibility programs, highlighting their commitment to sustainability and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). The awards, which recognize excellence in integrating sustainability into business operations, were presented by the Corporate Forum CSR Development in collaboration with national planning and economic coordination bodies.
